Recomendado.
Me gusto la precion que da, pero tienes que coperar mucho.
7/10

Pros : 
- This game is very fun to play with friends. And by playing the full squad the chance of survival will be higher.
- Have progress that will be quite time consuming. Collect bloodpoints to unlock perks, items, which greatly affect gameplay. This is not a problem considering the current conditions that require us to stay at home, we have so much time to grind right?
- Simple graphics and run smoothly on Low-End PCs/Laptops.
- It has many killer and survivor characters, and some of them remind us of childhood movies.

Cons : 
- Camping and tunneling killers in this game are very annoying.
- Don't play solo survivor, because teamwork is very important in this game. But there is no voice chat feature to facilitate communication between players.
- So many toxic player and derank players (players who should have top rank but intentionally lowered their ranks in order to be able to play with new players)

O jogo é bem divertido, dá para passar muitas horas e se divertir e o jogo te da a capacidade de adquirir novos killers sem te obrigar a comprar com dinheiro de verdade, é plenamente possível (com o mesmo esforço comprando cash) adquirir novos killers (tirando alguns especificos que são originados de filmes como o Freddy e Panico) e mesmo assim, vc ainda precisa jogar muito para desbloquear as habilidades.

Recomendo e acho muito divertido, é um jogo que pode-se tanto jogar com amigos e se divertir como survivor ou jogar solo e ter a mesma diversão como killer. Entretanto, jogar de survivor solo pode ser uma experiência bem negativa

Don't even bother playing this game if you want to play a killer. People use 3rd party voice comms to tell everyone where you are at, at all times. It is against the rules to use 3rd party programs but the devs do nothing about it and allow the game to be ruined.

This game is going to die if the devs keep going where they're going. They keep on nerfing the survivers and adding more OP ass killers. I don't understand why they have their heads up their asses. They need  to bring back the old movement. I don't understand whats the point of nerfing the movement because of 360ing. 360ing is one of the most skillful thing to pull on a killer and they nerf it. If anything they should buff it, since it feels rewarding when you pull it off on a killer. I also don't understand why so much people are saying that SURVIVERS are OPp. The devs nerf the toolbox,flashlights, and addon changes. they also nerf working with other people with gens. Have killers ever heard of PRESSURE. Good luck with having only killer mains in this game once everyone leaves. OHHHHH I almost forgot about SHITBOXES. Hitboxes is a major problem with this game, but hey, lets add killer with a fuckingg GUN. Also I'll be one mile away from a window and the killer can still hit me through it.

首先要给杀机五星好评啦：⭐⭐⭐⭐⭐(●'◡'●)
从16年就开始关注了，虽然玩的少但是一直都没卸载，也一直在向身边小伙伴安利着。
从某次看一个顶着“生化危机”头衔却播着杀机的直播，从虎牙阿铮、兔歌、爱推车的老汉到如今的巨色，付美丽，枯枯，193...
这游戏，属实让我魂牵梦绕。(pretty good job so far ~ )
初中时候的渣渣电脑一直觉得带不动杀机（这也是我第一次知道steam的存在），于是就开始了在贴吧的水贴之路（这也导致我极大地拉低了黄牌儿的平均水平，技术也没能跟上同时期的大部队(T_T)）看吧友写的《阿扎罗夫长眠之地》系列小说，当时杀机新屠夫护士长面世时候，讨论话题一度上了贴吧热搜。

从初代三皇到如今的幻神T0，从压电机一丝到最后齐齐亮到如今一jio踹到解放前，轻羽、低语（据说烬的手枪也叫低语耶( •̀ ω •́ )y）、鹰眼...，过去热门的技能现在还有人带吗？人类和屠夫之间的相互克制，从“我和屠夫玩一年”到终端局的出现...红段大佬匹配到20段萌新，（最近匹配机制优化了！不知道大家有没有同感），高延迟，罚站半小时游戏5分钟(●'◡'●)，还有原汁原味的bug...
直到某一天，我打开某直播平台，再搜不到这游戏了，虽然密码和账号都忘了， 但还记得自己当时的昵称--“零”，和我喜欢的主播的名字。
高中迫于学业，算是和游戏绝缘了一段时间。我不知道"弹射起步"这个名词在别的游戏里有没有，当我从同学口中听到这个名词时，就像是被唤起了某段记忆，他说--哦，那个啊，偷电贼和农场主的故事哦。
（曾有吧友做了个小计算，杀机日在线人数目前封顶5w，除以我国的城市数目，遇见一个玩这个游戏的人，得有多幸运。）
每天都有游戏关服，胆战心惊也一度想过会不会等到我玩的时候，它已经成为鬼服了(T_T)。
纵然是高三那样魔鬼般的存在，写杀机的小说交给语文老师看，已经成为了我当时为数不多的乐趣，还没写到护士长就已经毕业了，而我笔下的人物也永远滞留在了那片迷雾之中，这三年出了什么新屠夫新人物我也一无所知，熟悉的ID被陌生的面孔取代...
到如今上大学，在某一个特定的时间，走在参加python考试的路上，也就是19年的最后一个月。
“我一直以为我玩不了的。”
第一把遇到的是猪妹(●'◡'●)

“你能带我逃出去吗？”
“嗯。”
“什么时候。”
“世界末日。”

我感觉我比任何人都玩的久，却又永不及他人。

“如果你想成为幸存者里的大佬，建议你去玩屠夫吧。你得了解你的对手，了解他的活动范围，了解他眼中你的状态，了解他的技能使用...那都是你玩人类的时候，体会不到的。”
“但如果你没法克服你的心理...”

“变强或者退坑，或者加入幻神。”
（ps：野队日服偶遇啊，daga！）

Midchapter-Patch: größter fehlerhaftester Müll der dead by buglight Trilogie.
Ich spiele als Killer, trete den Generator und stecke beim Generator fest. Kann nicht mehr laufen, nichts machen außer den survivors beim reparieren und t-baggen zusehen.
Oder Killer hebt survivor auf und kann ihn nicht auf den Haken hängen weil alles komplett verbuggt ist. Ich kann schwer beschreiben was da abgegangen ist. Es sah so bescheuert aus ich kann es nicht in Worten zusammenfassen.

Falls die Probleme behoben werden sollten inklusive alte Fehler wie zum beispiel den Rang Aktualisierungsfehler oder der gute alte "unbekannte Fehler" der dich zurück zum Hauptbildschirm schmeißt das ich seit ich das Spiel habe vorhanden ist werde ich das Review entfernen. Aber da ist es wahrscheinlicher ein echtes Einhorn zu finden.

Nochwas kotzt mich an. Das Spiel ist unfähig ein simples update zu installieren. Nach jeden update muss ich das gesamte Spiel auf Fehler überprüfen sonst funktioniert das Spiel nicht.
Ich lade ein kleines update mit 170MB runter und plötzlich werden aus den 170MB 3GB weil lauter Fehlerhafte dateien wieder drin sind. Mir reicht es langsam mit euch liebes Entwicklerteam.

I've got two different ratings for this game.

10/10 with friends. 

Playing as a killer with your friends sorta feels like being the DM in a game of D&D, no matter how well you did, everyone likely had a lot of fun and you're already excited to play it again. Playing as a survivor with friends it's a lot of fun to coordinate and outsmart your currently bloodcrazed buddy. This is a perfect game for game night with friends.

8/10 alone. 

The devs do generally well at balancing fun with competition, but there are some big blind spots that exist in online matchmaking. Neither the community nor the ranking system is robust enough to handle the type of matchmaking necessary to optimize the balance between challenge and skill required for flow state. Either your opponent is new and still learning or your opponent plays at a competitive level, there is rarely an in-between. Also, the mechanics of the currency systems incentivize specific paths of play for many.

For example: in order to most quickly level up, purchase The Cannibal and level him as fast as you can using the perk Barbeque and Chili so that you can teach it to other killers. Then climb ranks as a killer so you can level the survivors since you make so much more blood points as a killer. The fact that the currency system pushes me towards playing a specific killer feels... wrong.

Instead, I would recommend the devs take control of this hazard and create a character specific perk for each available character (or a few different basic ones and leave that to be a special thing for some characters). Instead of BBQ and Chili incentivizing you to play Bubba, why not give the Hag, Trapper, and Demogorgon a perk that gives them extra blood points for effectively using their setups? Or give Dwight a perk that gives x% more bloodpoints each time he fully completes a coop action.

These would give players a clear path to follow that pushes them towards becoming better at the game while teaching them character specific mechanics. Doing this can also help build up that middle section of the community where the majority of players can feel comfortable with their competition.

Thank you for reading!
